Class ConfigurationsPreferencePage

java.lang.Object

          de.cau.cs.kieler.sim.kiem.config.preferences.ConfigurationsPreferencePage
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.IDialogPage, org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.IMessageProvider, org.eclipse.jface.preference.IPreferencePage, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPreferencePage
public class ConfigurationsPreferencePage
extends org.eclipse.jface.preference.PreferencePage
implements org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPreferencePage

Preference page for KIEM main configuration.

Modified version of the LayoutPreferencePage in de.cau.cs.kieler.kiml.ui by msp.

Author:
soh

Toggle either of the combo boxes.
